title: Equivariant Valuations on Convex Functions
authors: Georg C. Hofst\"atter and Jonas Knoerr
abstract:
We classify all continuous valuations on the space of finite convex functions
with values in the same space which are dually epi-translation-invariant and
equi- resp. contravariant with respect to volume-preserving linear maps. We
thereby identify the valuation-theoretic functional analogues of the difference
body map and show that there does not exist a generalization of the projection
body map in this setting. This non-existence result is shown to also hold true
for valuations with values in the space of convex functions that are finite in
a neighborhood of the origin.
